channel.title: Boricua Funk Club Podcast
channel.description: Live DJ mixed sets of House, Funky House, Latin House, Disco, Electronica, Baile Funk Also those sounds from around the globe that inspire people at the clubs, mixed by DJ/Remixer Rick Mendoza aka DJ Waiki, Influenced by the music changes through times (Club DJ since early 80's) always looking for fresh sounds, Expect something different through every episode and enjoy!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Planet's Best Music!
channel.itunes:author: Rick Mendoza
channel.itunes:summary: Live DJ mixed sets of House, Funky House, Latin House, Disco, Electronica, Baile Funk Also those sounds from around the globe that inspire people at the clubs, mixed by DJ/Remixer Rick Mendoza aka DJ Waiki, Influenced by the music changes through times (Club DJ since early 80's) always looking for fresh sounds, Expect something different through every episode and enjoy!

item.title: Rumba Mania - Boricua Funk Club Episode 34
item.description: Latin House grooves will get you dancing or learning spanish, just repeat after me, Pollito - Chicken, Gallina - Hen. Tracklisting: 01 Con Alegria (Solo'moreCowbell' Remix) - DJ Gregory & Gregor Salto 02 El Mango - Aitor Galan f./ Adriana Cases 03 Dejar de Amar (Dj Kone & Marc Palacios Remix) - John Jacobsen & Anzwer f./ Estela 04 Rumba Portuguesa (Dr.Bellido & Roger G Mix) - Intensa Music 05 Chispa Latina (Dub Mix) - Viada Asanin 06 Ayah! - Altura 07 Oye Mira - Joan Reyes 08 El Gringo - Kid Shakers 09 La Mania (David Herrero Remix) - Fuldner vs Pooleu 10 El Macho - Mastiksoul 11 Cumbia Lolita - Joyce Muniz & Shanti Roots 12 El Saxo (Carlos Silva's Saxy Afro Mix) - Dwight Brown 13 Vida Loca (Noki & Cristian Tomas Remix) - Master Plastic & Manuel 2Santos

item.title: Guest Mix -DJ RICH LIVE DUTCH MIX
item.description: Quick post, from a very good friend of mine from Puerto Rico's Mix 107.7 FM, DJ Rich bring us a live mix of popular Dirty Dutch House favorites, sorry no tracklist this time but you all know the songs. Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Rick Mendoza
item.itunes:summary: Quick post, from a very good friend of mine from Puerto Rico's Mix 107.7 FM, DJ Rich bring us a live mix of popular Dirty Dutch House favorites, sorry no tracklist this time but you all know the songs. Enjoy!

item.title: Swing Hop - Boricua Funk Club Episode 27
item.description: Swing to This - Boricua Funk Club 27 Inspired by 1920's 1930's music, the swing is making a comeback thru its influence in modern House music, the Jitterbug, the Lindy Hop were danced to a century ago but now, let there be House. Tracklist: 01 Buy One Get One Free - The Subject Is Jazz - dj Jalsomino 02 I'm Standing (Chris Kaeser Mix) - Steve Forest, X-Static 03 Ke Ke - F.Physical 04 La Caminata - Jason Rivas 05 Purple Pills (lisat & Voltaxx Remix) - D-Unity 06 Get Up (Julyan Dubson K-Liv Extended Remix) - Naguale 07 Drinking Piano (David Jones Mix) - David Jones vs Ron May 08 Freaking - Carlos Agraz 09 Can't Fight This Feeling (Hard Rock Sofa Remix) - Peter Luts feat Jerique 10 Pelo Canela (DJ Fronter Mtrfckrs Remix) - Sebastien Rebels 11 Sing Sing Sing (Yolanda Be Cool & Dcup Remix) - Jazzbit 12 Swing Time (David Jones Edit) - Will Gold

item.title: 2 Deep 4 Love - Boricua Funk Club 24
item.description: Time for Deep and Soulful House, while many youngsters like to bang the clubs, some like to relax. This one is for chill, sexy, soulful vibes and grooves, deep and latin. 01 Cobourg - Huxley 02 Ussircu - Doomwork 03 A Greater Love (DJ Meme Faithful Dub) - DJ Spen & Robert Owens 04 The Voice - Thyladomid 05 Lucky Star (Kolombo 2010 Unreleased Remix) - Superfunk ft. Ron Carroll 06 Pride (Yoruba Soul Mix) - Osunlade ft. Nadirah Shakoor 07 Thank You (Doruk Ozlen Vocal Mix) - The Layabouts & Pete Simpson 08 Light of Day (RC Voodoo Soul Mix) - Roland Clark 09 Can Love Again (Jovoon Next Moov Club Mix) - Hosanna Littlebird 10 For The Love (Doruk Ozlen Main Vocal Mix) - D'Moov ft. Nicole Henry 11 Latina (Ain't Nuthin' But A House Party Mix) - Jellybean ft. Marlon D

01 It's A Dub Thing - Ramon Tapia 02 Holdin Me (Armor House & Fennel Club Mix) - Blue & Deep ft Tib 03 On You (Viscious Remix) - Jessi Malay 04 Shorebreak (Magic Island Club Mix) - Daddys Groove & Little Mark 05 Rich (Static Revenger Dub) - Lolene 06 Viciosa (Spanish Extended Mix) - Hinojosa & Zambrano 07 Wait For Me (Jean Elan Remix) - Moby 08 I Want It All (Ian Neiman Remix) - Dangerous Muse 09 Her World Goes On (Digital Freq Extended Mix) - Justin Michael 10 Happiness (Jump Smokers Club Remix) - Alexis Jordan 11 In My Head (Wideboys Club Mix) - Jason Derulo

item.title: Canela Jungle - Boricua Funk Club Episode 20
item.description: From Latin to Progressive to Electro beats, few new tunes like The Jungle by JuNoMe (Syke'n'Sugastarr new project),Whole Lotta Love - Vanjee & Mark Alston ft Matt Belis and In My Eyes by Abel the Kid, Javi Reina & Raul Ortiz, these are hot tracks! Tracklist 01 Canela (Original A&F Mix) - Stefano Noferini 02 The Jungle (Syke'n'Sugastarr Extended Mix) - JuNoMe 03 Cava (Abel Ramos Amsterdam With Love Mix) - Abel Ramos, Mark Simmons 04 Miami Vice - DJ PP 05 Whole Lotta Love (Pete Gooding Dub) - Vanjee & Mark Alston ft Matt Belis 06 Morena - Alex Kenji 07 She Got It (Club Mix) - Vandalism & Angger Dimas 08 OMG (Riva Starr Remix) - Usher 09 Who's In The House (Chuckie Remix) - Chris Kaeser 10 In My Eyes - Abel The Kid, Javi Reina & Raul Ortiz

item.title: Nasty Club - Boricua Funk Club Episode 19
item.description: HI! Did u miss me? Hope so, well here is a mix with club bangers must play favorites amongst DroptheVibe.com users and couple new ones. Genres all over the place some progressive, some Electro , Baltimore beats, it's all good music. If you listen to it in the headphones i think you will really enjoy Wolfgang Gartner's Remix of Imma Be, it's a trip! Tracklist 01 I Wanna (Michael Calfan Remix) - Bob Sinclair & Sahara ft Shaggy 02 Nasty Boy (Ranny's Dirty Club Mix) - Jipsta 03 Let's Make Nasty (Afrojack Remix) - Larry Tee ft Roxy Cottontall 04 M.I.L.F.(Music I Like To Feel) - Scalix and Ramirez Del Flow 05 Imma Be (Wolfgang Gartner Remix) - Black Eyed Peas 06 Gettin' Over You (David Guetta Club Mix) - David Guetta and Chris Willis ft Fergie 07 Motherf#ck@ (Disco Fries Mix) - Greg Nice 08 Dirty Picture (part 2) FT Taio Cruz - Ke$ha 09 Freak (Disco Fries Remix) - Estelle 10 Party In Miami - Aria, Mark M.,DJ Ortzy 11 Around The World (Hmaster Edit) - Deepside Deejays ft Alex & Grasu XXL 12 Island Dream - Sasha Barbot 13 Fuckin' Down - Tristan Garner & Gregori Klosma

item.title: Spanish Fever - Boricua Funk Club Episode 15
item.description: Boricua Funk Club Episode 15 - FUNKY HOUSE SPANISH FEVER,OK so i did this one for myself, just love this grooves! I would like to know if anyone is reading this, would you prefer a silent mix, or maybe some small voice over? Do guys prefer Funky over Electro? Progressive, or Tribal, please comment and let me know, or else i'll mix for myself LOL!! As always please support this very talented artists who made this great music for your enjoyment, buy their music. Tracklist: 01 Santo Domingo - Mijail 02 Get Ready For The Man (Muzikjunki Remix) - Cablejuice 03 Cantina - Starkillers 04 Party Time (Extended Dude Funky) - Freedom Williams 05 Lala Song (Bob Sinclair SFP Remix) - Bob Sinclair 06 Express Yourself ft. Anna Buckley - Danny Verde & Phil Romano 07 Let Me Sip My Drink ft. Fast Eddie (Mastiksoul Remix) - Robbie Rivera 08 No Jazz (David Jones,Neuroxyde Remix) - Ron May 09 Everybody Yeah (Ibiza Night Remix) - Alex Barattini 10 Enjoy Music (Riva Star Remix) - Reboot 11 Vem Que Tem (Daniel Haaksman Remix) - Schlachthofbronx My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-c003a4583a34e434bdd284001930387d}

item.title: San Juan Eternal Summer 2010 - Episode 14 Boricua Funk Club
item.description: This week is back to the House by request, for those of you who long for lazy days and longer nights this is the medicine. Put your headphones on and feel the breeze....House mix for clubheads! Traclist: 01 Heartbreak On Vinyl (Danny Verde Remix) - Blake Lewis 02 Feelin Like A Superstar (2010 Ibiza Spain Import Remix) - Barbara Tucker 03 This Is Our Night (Sultan & Ned Shepard Remix) - Sander Kleinenberg 04 Party Round The World (Wayne G & Andy Allder XXL London Mix) - Jason Dottley & Debby Holiday 05 Today Is My Day ft Clarence (Danny Verde Remix) - Taito Tikaro, Ferran, J. Louis 06 Come Get My Lovin' ft. Marcella Woods (Hagenaar & Albrecht Remix) - Paul Gardner & Hugh Gunnell 07 I Feel Love (Danism Michale Gray Vocal Remix) - Ministers dela funk ft. Duane Harden 08 Are You Gonna Go My Way 2010 - Oscar Cano & Freddy Marquez 09 Something Going On 2010 (Jose Nunez Remix) - Richard Grey, Maboo Inc. vs Todd Terry 10 Take Control (Sted E & Hybrid Heights Club Mix) - Julissa Veloz As always all comments are welcomed, if you like the track, support the artist and buy it. Subscribe, vote, embed a player on your website, share and Enjoy! for bookings djwaiki@gmail.com join my facebook group http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=314161710398 invite people to join, Thanks.

item.title: Electro House - Boricua Funk Club Episode 13
item.description: This week episode features Electro House, rapidly becoming mainstream it's popularity is worldwide. Love that BASS sound, let it BOOM! Traclist: 01 Im A F**king Celebrity (Smith[db] & Waiki Remix) - DJ Timbo 02 On The Dancefloor ft Will.I.Am & APL De AP - Guetta 03 We Like - Street Savi 04 The Power Of Music (Wideboys Stadium Kane Dub) - Kristine W 05 Morning After Dark ft Nelly Furtado & SoShy (Chris Lake Remix) - Timbaland 06 Let Me Sip My Drink ft Fast - Robbie Rivera 07 Zipper - Pilot Priest 08 Show Me Luv - Beni Barca 09 Rock Star Swap Meet Bootleggers Electrobreak Remix) - Club District Allstars 10 Disko Biskit (Mini K Double Drops Mix) - Pascal & Pierce 11 I'ts The Way You Love Me ft Kelly Rowland - Guetta 12 Break Your Heart (Project Bassline Club Mix) - Taio Cruz ft Ludacris 13 Sex Slave - Mellefresh vs Deadmau5 14 Holding On (Disco Freak Club Remix) - Danny Wild vs Dj Skillmaster 15 Moon Knight - Stereoheroes 16 For The Love Of Girls - Wolfgang Gartner 17 Drop Hits (Santiago & Bushido Remix) - DJ Dan 18 We Will Rock You - Steve Sunray Enjoy!

item.title: Boricua Funk Club Episode 12 - Mainstream Dance
item.description: This week's podcast features Mainstream Dance/House/Tribal/Electro. New club sensation Charice with Pyramid (sure to be a club hit) and check out the video for Dirty Shake http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rPl6jR8kvYQ , kinda funny. Hope you enjoy it, and if you like it subscribe, comment, vote, share...and support the artists buy their music at your favorite music store. 1. Pyramid (Ruff Loaderz Club Remix) - Charice 2. Louboutins (Jody denBroader & Warren Rigg Remix) - Jennifer Lopez 3. Give Me Your Love (Max Sanna Remix) - Loverush UK! ft Carla Wener 4. Matasuegras (Mastiksoul Remix) - Nick & Danny Chatelain 5. Hey Hey (DF S Attention Vocal Mix) - Dennis Ferrer 6. Better Than Her (Jason Nevins Hybrid Remix) - Matisse 7. Storm (Sted-E & Hybrid Heights Club Mix) - Joel Evan 8. For Your Entertainment (DJ Escape & Johnny Viscious Tribal Dub) - Adam Lambert 9. Get Up (William Umana Funky Soul Remix) - Kimberly Davis 10. Dirty Shake (Peter Brown Dub) - Chris Montana ft Soraya Vivian 11. I Wanna Feel The Music (DJ Ranny Electropop Remix) - Chris The Greek Panaghi ft Laylah 12. Dama S Salon ft Dama S (Mastiksoul Remix) - DJ Gregory and Sydney Samson 13. My Belief (SnS Mix) - Syke'n'Sugarstarr & DBN ft Cosmo Klein

item.title: Favela Baile Funk - Episode 10
item.description: From the Brazilian ghetto Baile Funk is a new genre made by Brazilian DJ's for the underground and it became mainstream. Beats from the 80's Freestyle mixed with infectious Brazilian percussion and vocal samples that's gonna take the world by storm, already grabbing the attention in the US of the likes of Lil Jon and Pitbul. This music is Brazilian "PERREO" made for the dancefloor. Enjoy! Track List: Favela Baile Funk Num. Title Artist 1 Favela Funk Samba - DJ Amazing Clay 2 Tiroteio - DJ Sandrinho 3 Vem passar batom (feat. Tath Gulosa) - Mr.Catra 4 Quero você MC Marcinho 5 Deixa o Tamborzao Tocar feat. Mc Gus - DJ Amazing Clay 6 Olha pra baixo (feat. Tath Gulosa) - Mr Catra, Tath Gulosa 7 Gatinha Dub - Genghis Clan feat. Mr.Catra 8 Endereço Dos Bailes - MC's Junior e Leonardo 9 Rap do Pirão - MC Dieddy 10 Todo Mundo feat. MC Dolores (Edit) - Seiji 11 Sampler Louco - DJ Sandrinho 12 Subiu, Desceu (Vocal) - Feadz feat. MC Wesley 13 MACHUKA - LIL JON feat. Mulher Filé & Mr Catra 14 Who´ Afraid Of Rio feat. MC Jennifer (Radio Edit) - Daniel Haaksman 15 Para De Graçinha feat. MC Leka (Edit) - Crookers 16 Quero Buçeta feat. Duda Siri - Riva Starr + DJ Panko 17 Bum bum nao se pede - Mr.Catra 18 Tribos - DJ Sany Pitbull 19 Tchukatchu - DJ Edgar 20 Tamborzuda feat. MC Thiaguinho - Count+Sinden
